How can we have H3 scan a single site as quickly as possible?  We need to s=
pider an internal site and have a lot of room to throttle up.

We've done t=
he simple H3 configs like decreasing the delay factor, but haven't been abl=
e to get multi-threading working (for on a single site scan) without gettin=
g really creative with manually segregated seed URLs.

Ideally, we would ju=
st point H3 to a starting page of the site, and it would have multiple thre=
ads communicate to download the entire site as quickly as possible.  

Is s=
omething like this possible?  Or recommendations on how to get close to tha=
t functionality (using H3 or anything else)?
